thread.title: Manchester Airport Car Parking Experts Said Holidaymakers Are Wasting Money on Expensive Airport Car Parking
thread.title_full: Manchester Airport Car Parking Experts Said Holidaymakers Are Wasting Money on Expensive Airport Car Parking

author: prbuzz.com
title: Manchester Airport Car Parking Experts Said Holidaymakers Are Wasting Money on Expensive Airport Car Parking
text:
Thousands of people each week are wasting money on parking their car at an airport due to not comparing prices according to UK Airport Car Parks (UK-ACP)
According to UK Airport Car Parks (UK-ACP), a Manchester Airport Car Parking company, thousands of holidaymakers each week are wasting money when parking their car at an airport car park. The airport parking expert has said people need to compare prices to get the best deal.
UK Airport Car Parks (UK-ACP), has said holidaymakers do not understand they can save up to 60% on parking their car. The airport parking company who provide a comparison tool to check on all the prices would like to see people stop wasting money.
A lot of consumers who use Manchester Airport book through their travel agent or the airport without checking for a better price. According to UK Airport Car Parks (http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/car-parking/manchester) millions of pounds are being wasted each year by not comparing all the prices available. By spending one minute online, consumers can enter the details of the Airport they are travelling from and the date of arrival and find all the prices available. Through this method, they can see the best prices that are on offer.
Chris Fryer from UK Airport Car Parks said: "Holidays can be expensive during the summer months, and although we cannot bring down the cost of a package holiday, we can help people save money on airport parking."
The Manchester Airport parking expert would like to see more consumers comparing prices to put more money in their pocket to spend while away on holiday.
To learn more about UKairportcarparks.co.uk, and how to save money at Manchester Airport when parking a car, please visit http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/car-parking/manchester
About UK Airport Car Parks
UK Airport Car Parks provides car owners with a comparison site that allows them to find secure airport car parks at up to 60% cheaper than the normal price.
